name: diffhtml-prollyfill
description: Exposes an experimental browser API for diffHTML

scripts.build: browserify -g babelify -u diffhtml -x diffhtml -s diff index.js -o dist/diff-prollyfill.js
scripts.watch: watchify -g babelify -u diffhtml -x diffhtml -s diff index.js -o dist/diff-prollyfill.js -v

author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)
